name: Tsuushin Taikyoku: Igo Dojo 2700-Mon
overview: We prepare beginner courses and problem collections that allow you to remember the rules and how to play Go. While practicing, you can learn the basics of Go while moving your hand yourself. With the simple operation using only the Wii remote control, you can play against the computer, select the type of board from 9, 13 and 19 boards. You can check the knowledge you learned in the introductory course in the actual game. By answering the question, you can get a rough understanding of your understanding of Go. When making a decision, the computer will guide recommended courses according to the degree of comprehension.
